scripts.testLiveStream: npx codeceptjs run --steps -p pauseOnFail --grep liveStream --verbose --plugins allure
scripts.testMostRead: npx codeceptjs run --steps -p pauseOnFail --grep mostRead --verbose --plugins allure
scripts.test:Mobile: cross-env TEST_MODE=mobile npx codeceptjs run --steps -p pauseOnFail --grep mobile --verbose --plugins allure
scripts.test:headless: cross-env TEST_MODE=mobile HEADLESS=true npx codeceptjs run --grep @mobile
